content:
Hey <@${owner.id}>! Jarvi is finally online in your server **${guild.name}** 🎉
Sorry for the delay — here’s everything new in version **v0.1.2**! 👇

embeds.title: 🚀 Jarvi Beta — v0.1.2 is LIVE!
embeds.description:
Apologies for the late launch — we know we promised a 10 June release 🙏
But... the website took over and stole our sleep 😪

Anyway, **Jarvi is finally LIVE**, and wayyy better than before <a:Hurre:1395491574171046109>

🛠️ **What’s New:**
- 🐛 Fixed the *double response bug* (e.g. `{prefix}help` used to reply twice)  
- 🧼 Squashed tons of command errors  
- 🗃️ Switched to a brand-new database → All old data wiped  
- ⚙️ New **default prefix** → `**.**` ➝ `**,**`  
- 🎶 Introduced the all-new **Playlist System**

💡 **Playlist ID** is auto-generated when you create one (like `abc123`, `3dfbkm`)

🎧 **Playlist Commands (use `{prefix}`):**
- `create-playlist <name>` – make a playlist  
- `add-to-playlist <playlist_id> <song name/url>`  
- `delete-playlist <playlist_id>`  
- `edit-playlist <playlist_id> name|description <value>`  
- `import-playlist <playlist id or yt/spotify URL>`  
- `playlists` – view all your playlists  
- `pplay <playlist_id>` – play your playlist  
- `remove-song <playlist_id> <index>` – remove a track  
- `playlist-songs <playlist_id>` – view playlist songs

⚠️ Currently using a temporary **third-party music node**, so you *might* notice a tiny delay or quality drop. A high-performance node is coming soon!

🌐 Visit the new [website](https://jarvibeta.xyz) and let us know your feedback!

footer.text: You're receiving this update because you're the owner of "${guild.name}"
